buildings.name: Thieves' Den
buildings.description: Plan heists and fence stolen goods. Thieves acquire rare items through less legitimate means.

tiers.flavorText: Master assassin life drain is devastating.
Premium technique floods you with energy.
Master assassin kills grant tremendous energy.
Dodge attacks when health is low.
Master thief instincts make you nearly untouchable.
Chance to deal sneak attack damage.
Master assassin sneak attacks are lethal.
Thieves always have an exit strategy.
Premium escape plans work multiple times.
